You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesL L] > &longrightarrow;

== Value ==

There are 3 variations of this entity:

  * `&LongRightArrow;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/27f6/index.htm U+027F6].
  * `&Longrightarrow;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/27f9/index.htm U+027F9].
  * `&longrightarrow;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/27f6/index.htm U+027F6].
